test.name: Testing Recipe Front End

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets Selenium 2's default implicit wait in seconds and

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets Selenium 2's default implicit wait in seconds and

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
